The Virginia Tech Police Department VTPD has made incredible strides in creating safety resources for students since the events of  PERIOD Employing Ut Prosim the VTPD goes above and beyond to serve the Hokie community every day PERIOD It is always willing to help no matter what the emergency PERIOD

VTPD offers a multitude of resources for students to learn and prepare themselves for all types of emergency situations that could arise PERIOD Taking advantage of these resources can help Hokies stay informed and ahead of the game PERIOD Here are a few of the ways that VTPD encourages students to stay safe on campus

LiveSafe has every resource that Virginia Tech students and faculty need to ensure their safety on campus PERIOD The ability to immediately call  or campus police with the touch of a button anonymously report a crime or incident and have access to safety tips in case of an emergency are all available to anyone who downloads the mobile app PERIOD

If youre worried or feeling unsafe walking home at night have a friend watch you through the apps location sharing service to make sure youre OK PERIOD Its free easy to use and a good way to stay prepared and safe for any kind of emergency you may encounter PERIOD

The Rape Aggression Defense program at Virginia Tech is a FREE course that offers a handson approach to defense training PERIOD Female students and employees that sign up are given the opportunity to learn selfdefense techniques by fighting off local police officers that serve as mock assailants under layers of protective gear PERIOD What does this mean Kick punch and tackle a police officer the only time in your life you will actually be encouraged to PERIOD

Even better the VTPD is working toward implementing a R.A.D PERIOD program in defense of men so the program will soon be available to everyone in the VT community PERIOD

Chief of Police Kevin Foust says the VTPD will have finished training its instructors in October of this year and the first class for males will likely be offered after winter break PERIOD

To participate in R.A.D. fill out an online application now on VTPDs website PERIOD

Weve all gotten some weird Ubers at some point PERIOD It could have been an old woman hounding you for directions or maybe Jeremy was just driving a little too close to the curb PERIOD In any case VT Police is here to help with Safe Ride a free nighttime transportation service that operates from dusk until dawn PERIOD

Safe Ride is available for anyone in the Virginia Tech community students faculty staff and visitors to ensure a safe and comfortable experience getting home PERIOD The service also offers a nightly walking escort at night for those who have to cross campus alone PERIOD Call 540231SAFE  if you or a friend need assistance getting home or walking across campus PERIOD

Foust encourages the use of Safe Ride and assures that officers respect the privacy of anyone who calls claiming Our drivers do not ask anyone why they called Safe Ride. he shares In  we provided a ride to  passengers PERIOD Through the end of August  weve provided a ride to  people in . even with these resources the overall question here is Is Virginia Tech safe

Niche.com rates Virginia Tech as the eighth safest university in America so we must be doing something right PERIOD However with the size of our university there is bound to be some crime on campus.According to a  campus safety report the most popular crimes we face at Virginia Tech are sexual assault burglary and aggravated assault PERIOD Perhaps as LiveSafe R.A.D PERIOD and Safe Ride increase in popularity well see these numbers go down PERIOD

The Virginia Tech Police Department is here to help in any emergency whether it be keeping us informed with VT alerts or fielding our complaints and reports to the best of their ability PERIOD In the case of a nonemergency officers can be reached at  or found at  Sterrett Dr PERIOD  Blacksburg VA  PERIOD

Campus safety in the words of VT Police is a shared responsibility. for now follow the golden rule If you see something say something PERIOD Lets keep our home safe PERIOD
